name: Chimeric Fox
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Chimeric Creation: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
traits.Keen Hearing: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
